extends Object
implements Serializable
    A bounding collision box.

    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HitBox

        public HitBox(String name,
              BoundingShape shape)
        Creates a hit box with given name and shape. Local origin is set to default (0, 0).
        Parameters:
        name - name of the hit box
        shape - bounding shape

      • HitBox

        public HitBox(String name,
              javafx.geometry.Point2D localOrigin,
              BoundingShape shape)
        Creates a hit box with given name, local origin (top-left) and shape.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the hit box
        localOrigin - origin of hit box
        shape - bounding shape
